column3: “Fast onset, start feeling it as soon as you exhale with full effects after less than 10 minutes. Happy, euphoric, nostalgic. Play your old favorite video game on this or watch your old favorite move; you'll be all smiles. Comedown is sleepy but not groggy. A personal favorite.”

“Lemon OG is great. I has a great taste, and gives one a sativa-like cerebral high, yet has the pain reducing and insomnia reducing effects of an indica. This is the best medical marijuana I have ever tried so far. They knocked this one out of the park.I have fibromyalgia and this helps me tremendously. Two thumbs up!!”
“legit I have been listening to one song for 40 minutes now on repeat and honestly the sounds different every time this shit is straight fire you guys”
“If your thoughts were were written in the sand, this Kush is the wave that flows over and removes the words. Great strain if you've got nothing to do”

“I'm coming to this flower from some amazing Blue Dream. Lemon OG is a very different high, but amazing in its own way. It has a very strong body buzz that suffuses one with warmth and transcendent pleasure.... great for anxiety. However, for a pure indica the head high is impressive. Makes me feel creative, and provides artistic inspiration and confidence. I vaped this with some Maui Wowie kief sprinkled on top to en...”
“Had a big blunt of it, went down like a smooth glass of ojay. Made me happy and chilled as hell, about to go munch a bowl of wheaty-holes (weetos) 8/10”
“Smoking Lemon OG is like running face first into a wall.. a wall that smells like Pine-Sol”
“Lemonhead taste, ya know, lemony but with a little chemical taste in the background. Decent bud with a decent THC 22%. Does its job but prefer Allen Wrench in this category.”

“This wax will give you the leg up you need.
Right off the bat you'll notice the moist texture of the crumble, this is a good sign.  The high is energetic but also relaxing, your standard hybrid affair.  Taste is that of a subtly cooked pound cake mixed with essence of weed.”

“The scent is mellow and somewhat similar to OG Kush, not citrus-sour nor skunky.  There's a bit of fruitiness to it.  I'd say it's one of the best smelling strains I've had.  The buds themselves are light green from heavy trichrome dusting.   They are tight, dense buds and are marbled with light orange hairs which are similarly trichrome covered.  Under a magnifying glass, the buds just look beautiful.  The smoke tas...”

“Lemon OG is great, very fast acting head high after first hit (French inhale to get the more potent taste of the herb) very relaxing high, and long lasting! Tingles the nose with the smell inside the bad! 😌”

“My favourite strain! I’m prone to getting paranoid and anxious sometimes with certain strains but never with this one.

I’m in a giggling fit, happy and uplifted right away. It’s nice to have sex with this strain and a good daytime strain that doesn’t get you too stoned it’s perfect!”

“Grew two clones from 6 inches easily, they practically grow themselves.  Did one inside with lights, and another in the veg. garden with equally impressive results, for me anyway, none before grew like this in N. CA.  Bud rot appeared after first rain, so beware, but those precious, juicy buds were worth the minimal efforts and energy, just fish emulsion and peat moss for nutrients, with neem oil for a safe pesticide...”

“Smoking this as I write...Got from Bud Hut in Everett, WA; grower was Top Shelf growers...22%. Smells like straight up Minute Maid lemonade, so sticky I could turn my bowl upside down DQ Blizzard-style and have not a crumble fall out! Tasted like a non-sour lemonhead with a hint of ginger. Only took me three hits to get where I wanted to be! Absolute best strain I've ever smoked.”

“This is another review of a sample I've tried and was frankly VERY unimpressed! Once again I obtained this from an Ann Arbor delivery service that isn't on Leafly. The sample came from seeds obtained from DNA Genetics and the delivery service claimed they had it tested at 31.6% THC and just this figure alone should tell you how factual" it is. If this stuff is one of the highest THC strains around than high THC stra...”"
“Very fast acting head rush. More stoned feeling than high. Body high creeps on. Head high slowly diminishes while body high continues for a little after. Awesome smell and look. 9/10”
“Subtle Lemon smell. Smooth smoke, not harsh at all.  Slight spicy inhale, with a smooth finish. Good buzz, long lasting.”

“Крос и
 не прихотлив”

“I'm a new smoker, and I enjoy hybrids and indica to help with my anxiety, and this stuff really did the trick.  It didn't knock me on my rear like some other hybrid and indica strains, but it took away my anxiety and panic.  I was still able to function around the house while feeling happy and stress free.  It also smells and tastes amazing.  Would love to always have some of this on hand.”

“-Very nice smell
-Good tasting smoke
-Energetic high
-Focused enough to drive
-Easy to roll
-Stress relieving”
“The lemon flavor of this strain is outstanding. It's indica dominant with a strong body high. Makes me feel dizzy and completely relaxed.”

“This is perfect for insomnia! One joint and I’m out like a light. Keep in mind I’m a heavy smoker, so for one joint to knock me out is pretty rare... the buzz is narcotic like... not a big fan of the high but what it can do for medical purposes I give it the thumbs up. 🌿🌿🌿🌿 4 out 5 trees. 
Peace, 420TRUMP.”

“SOLID strain - great lemon smell without the diesel kushy smell you would expect (altho it is subtly there) -> very tasty smoke on the inhale and exhale.  Nice cerebral high - esp. for an indica.  Recommended.”

“Definitely an insomnia strain.  Unfortunately, the highs do not seem to last very long, but if you can use this strain and then immediately go to bed (but don't do so much that you get cottonmouth), you will be able to fall asleep fast.”

“Definitely an insomnia strain.  Unfortunately, the highs do not seem to last very long, but if you can use this strain and then immediately go to bed (but don't do so much that you get cottonmouth), you will be able to fall asleep fast.”

“This is perfect for insomnia! One joint and I’m out like a light. Keep in mind I’m a heavy smoker, so for one joint to knock me out is pretty rare... the buzz is narcotic like... not a big fan of the high but what it can do for medical purposes I give it the thumbs up. 🌿🌿🌿🌿 4 out 5 trees. 
Peace, 420TRUMP.”

“Dude this ish..rocks. took away depression and pain fairly quickly and effectively. Head in the clouds then body down in the bed. didn't last like a granddaddy purp but it had me where  I needed to be. it's def good bud, not a dud”

“This strain isn't bad, but isn't my favorite either.

It hits you pretty quick, and the head high is definitely a sativa thing, it still carries over too much indica. It makes you feel floaty and dizzy but not really euphoric and happy like a sativa would. 

The body high is also there, but it is too subtle. It is cozy but not couch locking. 

Overall, this strain has a balance of both types of weed, but sadly it onl...”

“Just like Anon said in the first post. It kicks you in the poo poo right out of the gate. It’s got me sittin’ here zoned out trolling on leafly for the past hour. And the taste goes without saying. I always loved that Lemon, Orange, pungent smell. Whether you’re a Indica lover or a Sativa head(like myself), you’ll enjoy this. Happy Toking!”
“Nice strain. Smells wonderful and tastes delicious. Good strain for daytime activities such as constructing bunk beds.”
“i love this strain it makes you feel weird and happy and active 10/10 my favorite strain, best weed i’ve ever smoked”

“First of all let me set the background. It was a warm humid day on April 19th I texted a friend asking if he knew anyone who could get me a LOT of that green flower we all enjoy. The next day I went and picked up about an ounce of this lovely bud.

- review -
I’ve now consumed all of what I purchased and and I can tell you one thing for certain, you can’t go wrong with this strain. The onset was indeed very quick. Th...”
“Great pot. A very familiar type of high not too much or too little of anything. Won't make you super tired or parinoid. good for aches and anxiety”

“This is an everyday strain. I hadn't had much experience with it until today, and with only three hits, I was transported to Utopia. It's made me feel euphoric, calm, in the moment, and just generally feeling really good. The psychoactive effects don't hit hard, and last for quite awhile; and when you come down, you don't come down like a piano on a cartoon cat, with a lot of sads....you come down pleasantly, like a ...”
“Lemon OG should be renamed something that's good". So when anyone asks for something that's good
column4: lemon og is what they get.

column1: One of my favorite strains. Numerous red hairs network through semi dense green and beige sticky wet looking nugs. I've seen shades of purple and blue in some nugs. Smell is like pine sol. Lemon
column3: eucalyptus
column4: with under tones of fresh cut wood
column6: and hash. Taste is sweet and pung...”"

column3: “this strain has got me in sweet muffin heavin, crumbs and all! thank you come again,and again and again, that's the vibe I'm getting from this weed. I'm gonna buy all you donut bitches and fuck all y'all up. got my pussy sweating pools of stoned sillyness.”
“I’m a heavy user and this particular strain gave me extreme anxiety — which has never happened to me before with any other strain. Would not recommend. On the upside, it tastes amazing.”

“My personal all-time favorite, the only thing I loved more than the invigorating smell was the flavorful taste smoking it. I hadn't been an avid smoker so I had no idea it could be like this. I always got a reliably quick and positive buzz that helped with anxiety quite a bit. For me the high was both arousing and sedating like I could go either way depending on mood which was sort of liberating in a way when you str...”
“i love this strain it makes you feel weird and happy and active 10/10 my favorite strain, best weed i’ve ever smoked”

“First of all let me set the background. It was a warm humid day on April 19th I texted a friend asking if he knew anyone who could get me a LOT of that green flower we all enjoy. The next day I went and picked up about an ounce of this lovely bud.

- review -
I’ve now consumed all of what I purchased and and I can tell you one thing for certain, you can’t go wrong with this strain. The onset was indeed very quick. Th...”
“Excelente elección para fumar en tiempos libres. Me gusto la actitud que me genero al hacer cosas. Buena para ver una película ;)”

I always got a reliably quick and positive buzz that helped with anxiety quite a bit. For me the high was both arousing and sedating like I could go either way depending on mood which was sort of liberating in a way when you str...”
“Very relaxing and great after a stressful day. Causes increased appetite and groggy come-down.”
“This is my favorite indica strain. This helps me sleep like a baby and takes my pain away really fast, plus it’s extremely tasty!”
“fucks me up & helps me sleep:: no complaints”
“11/14/18 Gives me anxiety/paranoia.     Don’t get again”

The psychoactive effects don't hit hard, and last for quite awhile; and when you come down, you don't come down like a piano on a cartoon cat, with a lot of sads....you come down pleasantly, like a ...”
“Smoked two blunts and was fried. watched what we do in the shadows and cracked the fuck up. 5 stars”
“Did a couple bowls. Talk about fuckedddd up. My muscles were spazzing, so relaxed, floating like a motherfucker. This stuff is the shit. Highly recomended!”
“fucks me up & helps me sleep:: no complaints”

I always got a reliably quick and positive buzz that helped with anxiety quite a bit. For me the high was both arousing and sedating like I could go either way depending on mood which was sort of liberating in a way when you str...”
“Very relaxing and great after a stressful day. Causes increased appetite and groggy come-down.”
“This is my favorite indica strain. This helps me sleep like a baby and takes my pain away really fast, plus it’s extremely tasty!”
“Excelente elección para fumar en tiempos libres. Me gusto la actitud que me genero al hacer cosas. Buena para ver una película ;)”
“This is my favorite indica strain. This helps me sleep like a baby and takes my pain away really fast, plus it’s extremely tasty!”
“i love this strain it makes you feel weird and happy and active 10/10 my favorite strain, best weed i’ve ever smoked”
“I love this weed. Damn that's so tough. Me and my buddy were so high 😍😍😍😍”
“I’m a heavy user and this particular strain gave me extreme anxiety — which has never happened to me before with any other strain. Would not recommend. On the upside, it tastes amazing.”

“New favorite!! Omg the taste is amazing, I’m OBSESSED. For me, this produces super happy, loud, giggly feels. I feel a bit loopy with some tunnel vision in the beginning, but it’s more cool and dreamy than anything. Dry mouth & eyes, but that’s typical for me. Definitely feeling the sativa in this beauty. So many crystals and lil hairs. The colors are perfect too! I think I’m in love <3”

“My personal all-time favorite, the only thing I loved more than the invigorating smell was the flavorful taste smoking it. I hadn't been an avid smoker so I had no idea it could be like this. I always got a reliably quick and positive buzz that helped with anxiety quite a bit. For me the high was both arousing and sedating like I could go either way depending on mood which was sort of liberating in a way when you str...”
“Great full body relaxation, kind of trance-like, nice & comfortable feeling. Gave me a massive giggle attack the first time which was fun.”
“fucks me up & helps me sleep:: no complaints”
“Great full body relaxation, kind of trance-like, nice & comfortable feeling. Gave me a massive giggle attack the first time which was fun.”

“New favorite!! Omg the taste is amazing, I’m OBSESSED. For me, this produces super happy, loud, giggly feels. I feel a bit loopy with some tunnel vision in the beginning, but it’s more cool and dreamy than anything. Dry mouth & eyes, but that’s typical for me. Definitely feeling the sativa in this beauty. So many crystals and lil hairs. The colors are perfect too! I think I’m in love <3”
“fucks me up & helps me sleep:: no complaints”
“Excelente elección para fumar en tiempos libres. Me gusto la actitud que me genero al hacer cosas. Buena para ver una película ;)”
“Did a couple bowls. Talk about fuckedddd up. My muscles were spazzing, so relaxed, floating like a motherfucker. This stuff is the shit. Highly recomended!”
“I love this weed. Damn that's so tough. Me and my buddy were so high 😍😍😍😍”
“I felt like I could feel my heart slowing down. The highest I've been in weeks. Feels really good to smoke this, stay inside with the heater on, and watch Netflix.”

“Lemon OG is sort of a novelty strain. It works to relieve my pain, but takes a bit to get the train moving (so to speak). I will pick this lil' guy back up once again. 

For those with bad nausea; PICK THIS STRAIN!
You will be able to eat no problem.”
“I love this weed. Damn that's so tough. Me and my buddy were so high 😍😍😍😍”

“Got this T25% oil vape from Bluepoint Wellness yesterday, and I'm loving the intense citrus flavor -- it actually has a sweet taste like Blueberry, which I love! Mine is an indica-dominant strain, yet hits more like a hybrid, which I prefer, in that it is not sleepy, but cerebral, and not couch-locking, but quite mellowing.. a new fave added to my medical (treasure-)chest!  Would give 4.5✨, if possible.. if only for ...”

“Great for day time pain relief . Dark and lovely dense buds that smell like lemon peels . It creates a citrus , slightly bitter , and sweet flavor lingering after the exhale. Perfect for creative inspiration with a solid body relaxing foundation .”
“I'll admit the batch I got was pretty stemmy and dry but this doesn't do much for me. A decent, quick high but then I find myself feeing nauseous, like motion sickness feeling. Not a fan.”

“The first time consuming lemon OG was the moment when I realized how much I truthfully loved cannabis. The Sweet Citrus Taste and The Skunk chaser was all it took for this cannabis to hit me with a heavy head high that was very relaxing”
“fucks me up & helps me sleep:: no complaints”
“With this strain I had pain releaf, and it didn't knock me out. I was able to continue with my day. I also like the smell of this herb, it's not overpowering.”
“best weed I've had in a long time.”

“New favorite!! Omg the taste is amazing, I’m OBSESSED. For me, this produces super happy, loud, giggly feels. I feel a bit loopy with some tunnel vision in the beginning, but it’s more cool and dreamy than anything. Dry mouth & eyes, but that’s typical for me. Definitely feeling the sativa in this beauty. So many crystals and lil hairs. The colors are perfect too! I think I’m in love <3”
“I felt like I could feel my heart slowing down. The highest I've been in weeks. Feels really good to smoke this, stay inside with the heater on, and watch Netflix.”
“Love it. Great nose to it and definitely great for those relaxed sessions”

“If I were on a desert island and a pallet of this washed a shore, you might not hear from your 420 buddy Mudflapp for a long time. And when I did resurface all crusted, dusted and disgusted, it would only to be to find more Lemon OG. of the K U S H variety. I would disown the name and fame of Mudflapp and only be known as Lemon, Lemon Lemon Lemon O G (said with echo effect of rick rubin cria 1980s Beastie/LL Cool typ...”

“If cat urine was a good smell. A fast and heavy onset of indica effects that I say all indica lovers should experience through this personal favorite strain of mine. Great for when I am having trouble with insomnia, muscle pain, aches, and anxiety. Best smoked in a natural tobacco leaf for those who prefer such methods. The tobacco buzz complements the Lemon OG high very nicely”

“Lemon Og has a nice mild brain buzz and a relaxing body high that gives off the best of both worlds. Pungent lemony smell and frosted buds are the best example I have seen of Lemon OG. Buzz lasts anywhere from 45-1.5 hours and has a slow decline so you're not left hanging and anxiety ridden.  I can medicate with Lemon OG to find some rest or take a hike. Lemon OG is a definite favorite of the Hybrids.”
“Very nice light smoke and the effects hit you very fast”
“This is by far one of the best strains i’ve ever had. it has a really pleasant and happy vibe to it. i definitely recommend it”

“If you’re a CPTSD-PTSD this is a 50/50 I could feel my body wanting to have a anxiety attack But I didn’t so I’m pleased however I’m going for a complete loss of the attacks. Very tasty as a concentrate can’t speak for flower dosed at 500mg 84% thc Live Butter. My husband is a pro sativa & was very relaxed and calmed he’s adhd”
“Love this strain. Very heavy hybrid high but yet very controllable.”

“Great strain , first pull , and your hit with that beautiful Lemony taste ! Then a few seconds later boom , your hit with a cerebral cuff around your head . Love this effect , high lasts about 3 hrs from just half a joint ! Most definitely a go to strain to start your weekend !”

“Lemon OG kush Auto from MSNL
what a crazy Lemon scent and flavor. when you break this bud it smell like the cleaning service is around with the pledge. 
The high of this OG is fantastic, so many good characteristics.
Lemon and Gassy notes, with some earthy bits on the punch. 
This strain was an Auto and produced 2oz from 1 plant with No training. 
Buds stayed uniform to the shape in which I cut them, get bag reps
My ...”
“Hits fast with a typical stoned feeling, high lasted ok amount of time.  Nice taste and beautiful crystalline nugs.  I recommend sucking down a couple extra puffs.”
“this strain will put you on a plane of sweet heaven. my body feels weightless and my mind has been set free.”
“It gives me munchies, makes me feel good and mellow. Rough hit from the bong but it’s nice. Head high is nice but man I got some munchies.”
“really good”

“Lemon OG kush Auto from MSNL
what a crazy Lemon scent and flavor. when you break this bud it smell like the cleaning service is around with the pledge. 
The high of this OG is fantastic, so many good characteristics.
Lemon and Gassy notes, with some earthy bits on the punch. 
This strain was an Auto and produced 2oz from 1 plant with No training. 
Buds stayed uniform to the shape in which I cut them, get bag reps
My ...”
“Hits fast with a typical stoned feeling, high lasted ok amount of time.  Nice taste and beautiful crystalline nugs.  I recommend sucking down a couple extra puffs.”
“this strain will put you on a plane of sweet heaven. my body feels weightless and my mind has been set free.”
“It gives me munchies, makes me feel good and mellow. Rough hit from the bong but it’s nice. Head high is nice but man I got some munchies.”
“really good”

“This strain is one that i would recommend to someone to use during the day. Although it is an indica and should put you to sleep i found that it did quite the opposite. The effects don't last as long as i would expect and it kept me awake rather than putting me to sleep. I also had some paranoia and a headache after smoking. The smell is extremely strong and the taste is a citrusy kush taste. Very strong but not reco...”

“Classic Cannabis.  I absolutely enjoy the lemon-pine-fuel tones accompanied by a comfortably uplifting body high.  It's not my favorite, but there's nothing I can complain about.  Very much recommended for new/casual smokers without being too intense.”
“Instant effects. Great taste. It smells so good. Its everything the reviews say. Wonderful.”
“this strain will put you on a plane of sweet heaven. my body feels weightless and my mind has been set free.”
“Nice, pungent smell. Dense, yet fluffy nugs. I got hit with a warm wave of feelings: happy, hungry, sleepy. Perfect bedtime bud. Great for unwinding after a long day and recouping.”

“Do you wanna finally relax and read a book or focus on the task at hand? This is the weed for you. I wouldn't suggest smoking before sleep or if you're the easily anxious. It's definitely a daytime high, just what I like in a hybrid. Leans more on the sativa side so you won't be sofa locked.”
“really good”

“Classic Cannabis.  I absolutely enjoy the lemon-pine-fuel tones accompanied by a comfortably uplifting body high.  It's not my favorite, but there's nothing I can complain about.  Very much recommended for new/casual smokers without being too intense.”

“Dense, and extremely aromatic, mainly due to its OG parentage, Lemon OG provides a pleasant, citrus-ridden smoke that both uplifts cerebral spirits, and  dulls physical discomfort. Prepare beforehand for a heavy dose of the munchies. Not a wake and bake strain, but definitely a heavy candidate for mid-day, and evening use. Under the tree this Christmas 🎄”
“Instant effects. Great taste. It smells so good. Its everything the reviews say. Wonderful.”
“Dabbed this strain and I don't regret it. The exhale tastes like lemon with a nice citric aftertaste. It's perfect for before you sleep, because there's a nice ass body high.”
“really good”

“Do you wanna finally relax and read a book or focus on the task at hand? This is the weed for you. I wouldn't suggest smoking before sleep or if you're the easily anxious. It's definitely a daytime high, just what I like in a hybrid. Leans more on the sativa side so you won't be sofa locked.”

“Classic Cannabis.  I absolutely enjoy the lemon-pine-fuel tones accompanied by a comfortably uplifting body high.  It's not my favorite, but there's nothing I can complain about.  Very much recommended for new/casual smokers without being too intense.”
“Instant effects. Great taste. It smells so good. Its everything the reviews say. Wonderful.”
“Dabbed this strain and I don't regret it. The exhale tastes like lemon with a nice citric aftertaste. It's perfect for before you sleep, because there's a nice ass body high.”
“I have recently been vaping Lemon OG, and still able to taste the lemon-citrus of this strain.  Head high is quick in arriving,  Pleasant and relaxing.  Great hybrid.”
“I have tried quite a few strains recently to find my favorite.... THIS IS IT!!! 1 bowl and I’m baked. Currently laying in bed typing this in a blanket of euphoria.”

“Great for muscle pain relief. Very quick effects too. Doesn't let ping but with layering or high dose it's great. Tastes better than it smells, lovely frosty nugs, just how I like 'em. It's definitely a different lemon flavour than your usual lemon hazes, but I do prefer a more pungent flavour myself. People saying it gives them munchies, but for me it was an appetite suppressor. Otherwise, happy and relaxed effects,...”
“I have recently been vaping Lemon OG, and still able to taste the lemon-citrus of this strain.  Head high is quick in arriving,  Pleasant and relaxing.  Great hybrid.”
“One of my favorites. Tastes good even when almost beat and gives you this very relaxed feeling smoke before you go to bed and you will have an amazing sleep”
“I have tried quite a few strains recently to find my favorite.... THIS IS IT!!! 1 bowl and I’m baked. Currently laying in bed typing this in a blanket of euphoria.”

“Very happy uplifting hybrid with very calming after effects.  This is definitely a good medical as well as connoisseur strain. The smell of this beautiful flower is very pungent. Fuel  and sour lemon. The taste is very thick pine with lemon. This to me Is a very desirable look, smell and taste. Along with excellent effects this is a top shelf cannabis without a doubt. If you want to see top shelf get yourself a good ...”

“Great for muscle pain relief. Very quick effects too. Doesn't let ping but with layering or high dose it's great. Tastes better than it smells, lovely frosty nugs, just how I like 'em. It's definitely a different lemon flavour than your usual lemon hazes, but I do prefer a more pungent flavour myself. People saying it gives them munchies, but for me it was an appetite suppressor. Otherwise, happy and relaxed effects,...”

“Very pleasant strain with intense smell and flavour. Makes giggly, happy, recommended for daytime use.
Wouldn't expect such effects from a kush, but it's a great hybrid of sativa and indica effects with a distinct citrus aroma.”

“Rolled this strain into 11 blunts, almost fell like ten times, 😂
gave me and my friend the giggles 😂”

“I love Lemon OG. It was a strain that grew on me, kind of like an acquired taste. Its a 60/40, and anything beyond a 50/50 will set off my anxiety, so this is a perfect fruity exotic strain. Very unique smell(lemon) and taste(floral lemon) come along with this strain, and quite a bit of heady potency. A good daytime strain, does not make me fall asleep which is great for use during physical activities as it alleviate...”

“Very tasty and refreshing! Strong flowery, citrusy taste. Super relaxing but at the same
 time, I didn't feel faded. All around good vibes.”

“Lemon OG Kush is in a category of it's own. If you have a dispensary that delivers good medicine like Hardcore Harvest in Montrose Michigan, and you happen to come across this strain, don't pass it up. There is no wait, no creep here. You'll start to feel the very unique cerebral effects almost instantly. The sativa side comes on fast and strong, but like Leafly's description, it quickly mellows into a full body rela...”
“Very good strain one of my favorites. You definitely feel hit as soon as you hit it a couple of times. Good for relaxation and sleep. :)”

“My friends and I had smoked it out in the woods for a fun 4th of July but what happened was so bad. My one friend is really new to smoking and we kept passing him the blunt anyways. 10 minutes later he can’t even walk and we’re babysitting him. He couldn’t get up and acting like he had autism and we were genuinely really scared for him. He sobered up after 3 hours and was fine but I’m still giving it a 5 cause it was...”
“great taste.. nice mellow buzz”

“Makes you sleepy without the coach lock
Smell like lemon pledge very good for night smoke”

“Lemony fresh (: 
Love it on a lazy Sunday morning.”
“this strain is awesome! got some shatter from Cascadia Gardens. It will definitely make you sleepy.”

“Pretty quick hitting high
Energetic
Don’t think it lasts long or maybe because that’s just bc I hit a bowl and then took a CBD edible”

“This strain is in my top 10. Upon looking at it, it looks great! It has a lemony citrus taste, and a great body buzz. The first 10-15 mins I really felt it’s sativa qualities, but after that I got really couch locked. Munchies are a thing, so make sure to have some snacks around. I recommend this as a late afternoon to evening bud, because you will have some great sleep.”
“Ive always loved this strain!”

“This strain is the dopest daddy, after you hit this immediately so a 180° turn and you will see your skull cap on the wall with your mind splattered next to it. but keep a drink nearby because you will get cotton mouth.”

“The only reason im commenting on this strain is because leafly doesn't have the strain listed that i have which is Moonlight OG Kush its fucking 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 and taste great so imma rate this five stars in honor to MLOGK”
“Got some lemon of shatter from arizona organix, great quality and citrus taste. def go get some you won't regret it!”
“Really good head high along with body the only thing that's ever bothered me about this strain is dry mouth that's it but other than that it's a really impressive high”
“I picked up a gram of lemon og honeycomb recently and I love this Strain. Two dabs of this makes for a pain free day. Delicious to boot.”
“Sweet and smooth, good for evening, chill and bedtime”
“Lemon OG is a creeper for me.  Not an extremely intense high, but definitely a medicated feeling. It calms me down and and gently puts me to sleep.”
“Very stony strain. Smells and tastes delicious, fast acting, a few hits and you’ll feel the effects almost immediately.”
“Good high when you wanna chill snack and watch a movie 😁”

Not really up for munchies.”

“realy helps with my insomnia problems. great for pain relief and strong medical marijuana. my favourite so far, it should be treated like an indica strain. great citrus taste and sweet, makes it one of the best strain to be the last of a working day.”

“Amazing strain. Taste is on point. High is sharp and cerebral. Don't need much. My anxiety starts to go and I smoke at least 2 grams a day myself... Looks like fire and is honestly some power at only 22%”

“Nice definitely a chill, relaxed strain”

“Love this. Second best strain I've had while I was in Colorado. I definitely tasted the lemon land the smell was on point with the taste. This strain definitely left me feeling euphoric and uplifted.”

“It has a strong, cognitive effect, but it makes me feel anxious more often than any other strain I have tried. The smell is pleasantly citrus/ with a slight skunk musk. I never feel my body relax on it. My mind is more keyed up.”

“Flamethrower”

“This strain has an amazing taste! Its exceptional in a sense that its a smooth high.

“I love this strain. super smooth going down and serious taste of lemon yum! def one of my favs  now”

“not the very best I've ever smoked but still in the top 25 strains, got an 1/8 oz and had me uplifted for almost 3 days, from wake and bake to nightly toke this strain kept my mood in check for the day and didn't have any of the usual side effects" (aka cotton mouth

“Enjoy a nice day outside, go swimming or visit your local cinema! Focused and euphoric happiness as well as deep calmness if smoked in concentrate.”
“Lemon OG is very beautiful, and has a great sweetish taste. Overall after lighting up I felt very happy and mellow. Would recommend 8.5/10”

“Better rolling in a joint over a bowl just got a better high. definitely got that lemon tingle felling very nice”

“Moxie came out with a line of trim-run concentrates. This is one of the two I've tried so far. It hits on all points. The flavor is what you would expect from the name, the effect is heady but focused. Perfect for the afternoon as it will stimulate your appetite and make you happy it's lunchtime.”
“I  love it the smell is skunky and the taste is absolutely wonderful it gets the job done. one of my all time favorites”

“Oh man, this stuff is definitely potent.  I am not a huge fan of the lemon taste... a little too skunky for me, but it certainly does the job.  It has a very citrus-y, woody spice to it.  It does give you a KILLER case of the munchies, and I need to try to lay off of that.  ha!

“Very nice. Awesome for pain relief.”
“Excellent for pain relief! Including nerve pain.”
“This one has a very quick onset. Very strong body tingling from head to toe. warmth washes up and down your body. awesome for stress relief.”
“TALK ABOUT THE FLAVOR PACK! Best tasting concentrate I've ever had!”

“I got this from a local dispensary in southern oregon, it quickly rose to my top 5 favorite as I went back for more 2 days later. “Good strain for post work activities, keeps me relaxed and engaged with the family through the evening hours, and then creeps down around bedtime.”

“Got some lemon of shatter from arizona organix, great quality and citrus taste. def go get some you won't regret it!”
“this strain will put you on a plane of sweet heaven. my body feels weightless and my mind has been set free.”
“great taste.. nice mellow buzz”
“Love this strain. Very heavy hybrid high but yet very controllable.”
“Very nice light smoke and the effects hit you very fast”

“Love this. Perfect for a meditative state, I find it easy to access my subconscious mind and reprogram it. Nice for changing negative beliefs. Gives a positive feeling, a state of mind where it's easy to let go of things and see them from a broader perspective.

“Pretty quick hitting high

“I have tried quite a few strains recently to find my favorite.... THIS IS IT!!! 1 bowl and I’m baked. Currently laying in bed typing this in a blanket of euphoria.”
“Hits fast with a typical stoned feeling, high lasted ok amount of time.  Nice taste and beautiful crystalline nugs.  I recommend sucking down a couple extra puffs.”

“If you’re a CPTSD-PTSD this is a 50/50 I could feel my body wanting to have a anxiety attack But I didn’t so I’m pleased however I’m going for a complete loss of the attacks. “Lemon Og has a nice mild brain buzz and a relaxing body high that gives off the best of both worlds. Pungent lemony smell and frosted buds are the best example I have seen of Lemon OG. Lemon OG is a definite favorite of the Hybrids.”

“If cat urine was a good smell. A fast and heavy onset of indica effects that I say all indica lovers should experience through this personal favorite strain of mine. Great for when I am having trouble with insomnia, muscle pain, aches, and anxiety. Best smoked in a natural tobacco leaf for those who prefer such methods. “I was kind of sad about this one. I expected to get a nice classic OG Kush feeling with a lemony pop. What I got was a little more like a fizzle. This hybrid starts out strong with a great heady buzz but then quickly drops off to a non-satisying, munchie fest.”

“Hits you fast and hard! Exactly what you want from a Hybrid. Lemon OG is one of the contemporary classics in my opinion. Often available for cheap at dispenseries (6/g) it’s without a doubt one of the best bang for your buck strains out there!”

“Lemony fresh (:

“Makes you sleepy without the coach lock
Smell like lemon pledge very good for night smoke”

 time, I didn't feel faded. All around good vibes.”

gave me and my friend the giggles 😂”

“Dabbed this strain and I don't regret it. The exhale tastes like lemon with a nice citric aftertaste. It's perfect for before you sleep, because there's a nice ass body high.”

“Classic Cannabis.  I absolutely enjoy the lemon-pine-fuel tones accompanied by a comfortably uplifting body high.  It's not my favorite, but there's nothing I can complain about.  Very much recommended for new/casual smokers without being too intense.”
“really good”

“amazing strain. great flavor, smell, and taste. its like eating a lemon without the sourness. great high”

“seven only on price.. this lemon strain.. LEMON KUSH was pretty on point.. it was a believe a 60/40% indica strain, and you could feel the indica (in the couch) effect right away which was nice. Id pick up an ounce if I had the dough.. 60 for 5 grams aint bad though.. thanks green light delivery!”

“This strain is one that i would recommend to someone to use during the day. Although it is an indica and should put you to sleep i found that it did quite the opposite. The smell is extremely strong and the taste is a citrusy kush taste. Very strong but not reco...”

“i just stared at a bright light for three seconds and got on of those eye floaty thing and I just stared at it the eye floaty thing for so long that I actually thought I was a in a different planet with that eye floaty also I crave Taco Bell rn”
“My eyeballs are heavy but in a good way 👀”
“I am a daily smoker with a high tolerance, and I really like this strain because it gets the job done with a small bowl.”
“Nice, pungent smell. Dense, yet fluffy nugs. I got hit with a warm wave of feelings: happy, hungry, sleepy. Perfect bedtime bud. Great for unwinding after a long day and recouping.”
“a stink that is to die for from the og with a fine lemon tone mmmmmmm”
“My friends and I made a waterfall bong and smoked this strain it's a super sweet citrus just the most amazing smell it was slightly energetic at first but calmed down into a relaxed body high”
“the best that helps me with my medical problems”

“Dense, and extremely aromatic, mainly due to its OG parentage, Lemon OG provides a pleasant, citrus-ridden smoke that both uplifts cerebral spirits, and  dulls physical discomfort. Prepare beforehand for a heavy dose of the munchies. Not a wake and bake strain, but definitely a heavy candidate for mid-day, and evening use. Under the tree this Christmas 🎄”

“I recently picked up some nugrun Lemon OG hydrocarbon wax by Gabriel it's awesome it tastes like a skunky lemon drop it's nice and relaxing but with enough energy to keep you up and going if you have anything you have to get done, I use a dab rig, quartz bucket, carb cap, all that, and at low temp the flavor on this is awesome and at over 90% total it's pure gas!”

“Smells like grass upon opening the bag of nugs.. not initially pleasing tbh. When grinded up, this strain smells of a lemon-grass aroma. Full bodied lemon, earthy taste when lit. Immediately felt what felt like the back of my esophagus relax in a pulse-like feel upon taking in first hit. Almost immediately relaxing my body... de-wiring me before bed. So far, I liiiiike this one 🕯”

“Do you wanna finally relax and read a book or focus on the task at hand? This is the weed for you. I wouldn't suggest smoking before sleep or if you're the easily anxious. It's definitely a daytime high, just what I like in a hybrid. Leans more on the sativa side so you won't be sofa locked.”
“Not a bad strain, but I would choose something else next time. It did what it was supposed to do, as one would expect from a kush, but among kushes I've definitely had better.”
“tasty and fast relief for pain”

“This is such a great strain. It's a fast acting, with the effects happening almost immediately, euphoria, happiness, and relaxation. And surprisingly, you don't really get the munchies after smoking this. While this may be a hybrid, you more or less have more a sativa type head high with the lemon og kush. Also, the buds are very beautiful looking.”

“I tried it once and knew I liked it but passed it up a few times to try new favors.. That was a mistake. From past experience if it had lemon in the name or smells like lemon it was definitely something I wanted. Picked some up and it was some of the best flower I had in a while! I think this strain will make any type of patient happy.”
“One of my favorites. Tastes good even when almost beat and gives you this very relaxed feeling smoke before you go to bed and you will have an amazing sleep”
“Nice after work stunner.  Helps to relax but dont plan on going anywhere soon.”

“Very happy uplifting hybrid with very calming after effects.  This is definitely a good medical as well as connoisseur strain. The smell of this beautiful flower is very pungent. Fuel  and sour lemon. The taste is very thick pine with lemon. This to me Is a very desirable look, smell and taste. Along with excellent effects this is a top shelf cannabis without a doubt. If you want to see top shelf get yourself a good ...”
“has a fruity smell to it with that skunky & lemon taste to it.”

“Very pleasant strain with intense smell and flavour. Makes giggly, happy, recommended for daytime use.
Wouldn't expect such effects from a kush, but it's a great hybrid of sativa and indica effects with a distinct citrus aroma.”
“sweetleafy”
“This indica/sativa hybrid was really good for stress/anxiety. It was a medium-heavy indica stone, but it still had the stimulating effects of a sativa. Good for playing piano and being creative.”

“Decent pick-me-upper for the afternoon and early evening. I'm a daily toker, so this doesn't sedate me too much, and I feel a nice cerebral effect that's good for watching TV or playing games. Doesn't get you crazy-high, doesn't get you crazy-stoned. I wouldn't call the effects mellow"—more of a nice "buzz" than anything.

column1: Not my favorite strain in the world
column3: but that's a personal preference. Also not a ...”"
“loved it. Amazing dense buds. Euphoric head buzz causing instant relaxation of the body.  I smoke everyday for the past 20 years and this is a night smoke for me. I use sativa for daytime.”

“I really enjoy kush strains, but citrusy or piney strains mess with my sinus and gives me headaches.....I know I know......I'm not picky when it comes tomarijuana! This strain did relax my body the way kush does, but I just couldnt shake how it affected my sinuses!”
“punch in the face of earthy and pungent aromas. Helped me alot with my insomnia/chronic wrist pain.”
“Made me feel relaxed and calm. Good for my anxiety  and depression. Really enjoyed the feeling.”
“this strain is great fo that backyard chillin with a bottle if beer. also good for a night cap toke.”

“I love the taste and the smell of this strain, but it's naturally stemmy grow is a drag for me.. The buds are very light and sparse around usually pretty thick and sprawling stems. That being my only complaint, the effects are wonderfully mixed between indica and sativa, for me it tends to be more uplifting than couch locky.”

“I felt like this strain was WAY sativa dominant. Smoked a blunt while cooking breakfast this morning and proceeded to clean the whole kitchen afterward. Def got an energetic head buzz, so its a great morning bud but i tend to prefer more of an indica which is the main reason it gets 3 stars”
“this strain is awesome it taste great and the high hits you quick. pretty good size nugs to go with it to”
“love this strain who ever didnt smoke this strain yet my advice is to do it because u will miss everything from it from the taste. I used it with a berries blunt nd its like heaven taste it”
“definitely good to have on rotation. the high is fairly sedative, the flavor is amazing! definitely good abd hella when getting ready for bed”
“love the weed yo .! the dence nugs were like white fire. the lemon was there and so was the high 27%”
“out of luck i tried a gram of this strain and i've gotta say, Lemon OG is definitely a keeper. probably my number one choice! high quality bud and amazing flavor. i'd highly recommend!”

“A decent anti anxiety or depression strain. Not a night time medication in my opinion. I tend to prefer super silver haze which I feel is comparable but superior strain for my uses. Where ssh is euphoric this is tripy”
“Literally the stickiest bud I've ever had. It's making my grinder stick together, and I've scrubbed my hands with dish soap and my fingers are still sticky.”
“It gives me munchies, makes me feel good and mellow. Rough hit from the bong but it’s nice. Head high is nice but man I got some munchies.”
“my first bowl, feeling more than excellent, sativup and indacouch meshing well in this lovely feno.  will be back to review once I finish this purdy g”
“Very good night time strain, makes one feel quite tired, not good to smoke during the day time”
“love it nice and relaxed didn't taste any lemon.  Its calming and stress releasing and pretty potent(hits fast) love it.”
“Nice, gave me nice high upper then the kush jumps in.  Nice  upper- and between.  This Bho dabb.”

“ok so, I'm usually an indica only person. I don't usually ever even smoke a hybrid. but, after a few bowls of some mendu kush, I took a fat rip of some lemon OG kush. 
this stuff is fire. what a fantastic journey this takes you on. really has become a favorite pretty damn quick. what everyone says is true. you do get a little head fuzz, but it's awsome and the body buzz is seriously relaxing. Lemon OG Kush is a great...”

“I don't know how I can be so relaxed, yet so talkative and creative at the same time, but this strain pulls it off; a perfect hybrid. Put me in a great mood. Lemon citrus taste as one would expect. Don't pass it up.”

“A fantastic Kush strain! This stuff, when grown properly, is one of the more perfect strains in exsistance. The structure of the buds are like hard, tight , medium size buds covered with crystals and smelling a little bit like a skunky rose. I liken the effects to that of OG Kush, although the sativa properties lend an uplifting feeling initially. Lemon smells way better than the OG as well. This is one you can smoke...”

“The batch that I received of Lemon OG from Washington was phenomenal.  After two treatments courtesy of my vaporizer, I was in a mental stupor - zoning in and out.  If you have lofty goals and a lot to get done, this is definitely NOT what I would be medicating with!  I'll stick to my Jack for that.  I actually started to trip after a solid two trenches on my magic-flight.  By far the most potent indica I've ever had...”
“great smell and flavor. intense high definitely will put you to sleep.”

“I like this flower. It tastes great, super stoney, and smokes great. I was told that this strain would knock me out because I having issues sleeping lately but I had no luck. Soo I'm a little disappointed but still it's a nice bud. I probably won't grab again but I'm sure you'll enjoy. Go pick some of this Lemon OG up!”

“Just had a single rip of this from a chillum and I'm feeling pretty zoned out. I've already had a good bit of Green Crack today, so this is proper evening bud. My mind feels like a buffet lathered in extra gravy!”
“Great sweet tasting strain! 👌🏽🙌🏽 def a night time strain! 😎”
“This strain is fire. Great euphoric and relaxed high and it doesn't take much to get you f**kes up. There's a head high and a body high. I had a great time with this bud”
“Very good weed. It gives me a very fast acting high.”

“My favorite Craft Cannabis strain and one of my All Time favorite along with some Grand Daddy Purp I got here in Las Vegas! The taste is amazing! You can literally taste every aspect of the plant in one hit, but makes you want that taste from ever strain you get! With Lemon Og you are never dissatisfied! Then you calculate the price, 160/oz big phat nugs, if I ha the money I'd stock up for 60 years so I can enjoy it ...”
“Smelled great tastes just like a lemon!!! Got me feeling  it right away gave me energy and major munchies!!”
“BA chine”
“Great bud, good looking.”
“this one is not smelling lemon..smells spicy high is good lemon and og combined..get it”
“the batch I got was dry n un trimmed. looking for a good lemon sour, experience try cinex.”

“I was given a few flowers to try from a friend, he admitted they were whispy, but that doesn't always translate to bad bud. The structure looked pretty good, but they definitely weren't dense. The smell was a faint lemony aroma, pleasant, but not strong. Unfortunately it seems the grower harvested a little early, trichomes are almost all clear. The smoke was okay. Light and heady, I didn't get the medicinal benefits ...”

“Lemon OG was very kind to me. It made me feel very relaxed but it didn't force me into sleep it gently slid me into it.  Depending on your tolerance of course. Also I had very peaceful and happy dreams. I woke up refreshed and recharged. Mellow.”

“So clearly, I'm gonna to have some  bias here... after all, Lemon OG Kush was the door that opened my world to Cannabis! 
After a little apprehension,  I inhaled with full vigor... 
1st Pull- smooth."

column1: 2nd pull- "smooth and warm" (I must not be doing it right.  Everyone coughs their brains out the first time they smoke. )

column3: “Blaises mix, smoked in his back yard”
“A friend grew this locally. Great job homie!”
“makes me feel like god has anally raped me and cum all through my body, in a good way. also has lemony taste and smell. very nice”
“The Lemon OG gives you more of a cerebal high. Most my niggas say its the best they ever tried. A lot of people hating on it.”
“great stuff”
“faqing bomb shit dood”
